data.title: The Machine Girl
data.meta_description: Find out how to watch The Machine Girl. Stream The Machine Girl, watch trailers, see the cast, and more at TV Guide
data.text:
2008

1 hr 38 mins

Drama, Horror, Comedy, Suspense, Action & Adventure

NR

Watchlist

High-caliber revenge drama stars the incredible Minase Yashiro as a teenage girl armed with a machine gun---literally. She has a fully functioning machine gun attached to her left elbow and uses it to square things with murderous high-school bullies who killed her beloved brother. She also sets her (gun)sights on the unsympathetic parents of the violent thugs. Asami, Honoka, Kentaro Shimazu, Ryosuke Kawamura, Nobuhiro Nishihara . Written and directed by Noboru Iguchi.
